datastructures

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • datastructures.Node

  • public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    Node class for the nodes of every heap. TODO Check for attribute redundancies as time permits (LOW PRIORITY).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Node(int x)
      Initializes a new node with value x.
      Node(int x, int y)
      Initializes a new null node.
      Node(int value, Node leftChild, Node rightChild)
      Constructs the node with value, references to both childs and initial s-value of 0.

      • Node

        public Node(int x)
        Initializes a new node with value x.
        Parameters:

      • Node

        public Node(int value,
            Node leftChild,
            Node rightChild)
        Constructs the node with value, references to both childs and initial s-value of 0.
        Parameters:
        value - numerical value being set as int.
        leftChild - reference to nodes leftChild child.
        rightChild - reference to nodes rightChild child.

      • Node

        public Node(int x,
            int y)
        Initializes a new null node.
        Parameters:
        x - Value of null node.
        y - Priority of null node.

    • Method Detail

      • link

        public void link(Node parent)
        This method turns caller node to child node of the parameter node.
        Parameters:
        parent - node that is being linked as parent.

      • reverseRootList

        public Node reverseRootList(Node tmp)
        This is an auxiliary method for deleteMin method. It reverses the root list.
        Parameters:
        tmp - the min node of the root list to be reversed.
        Returns:
        the min of the reversed root list.
